title: The Adventures of Bob and Andrew
description: Jump on the Adventure with Bob and Andrew!  A great bedtime story for children aged 3 to 7 years old! This book is about a 7 years old boy called Andrew. One day his father comes home with a Saint Bernard puppy! He names the puppy Bob. Andrew and Bob start playing and the adventure begins.   This book can also help you teach your child more about:     Responsibility ,   How to take care of a dog    How to deal whit a lost ball :)    How to brush their teeth every night    Reading Friendly  This book contains over 17 color pages with beautiful illustrations. This book is easy to read and is suitable as a self-read for beginner readers.
author: Andrew Becket
